title: Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha3 released - Third iteration of our Jakarta EE 10 stream
content: As you might know by now, we started a Quarkus 3.0 effort last year and we are continuing this effort, which was described here, here, here, and here. Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha3 is the third iteration of this work. On the Jakarta EE 10 front, it doesnâ€™t bring anything new, except for...
